column5: http://www.lineonfishing.com/index.p...30-how-to-pack I don't know if this has ever been posted here.But there is a lot of great info.
Well I guess it must have been posted.At the end they thank all the members of walleye central.But it is a great resource if you don't have a lot of experience,or even if you do.
I just scanned over the article. Looks like Adam covered everything! Be nice if management could pin this somewhere, I'm sure people would look it over every year.
It is a great article. Thanks for posting it!
